original_text: Think about our ancestor Abraham. He offered his son Isaac on the altar as a gift to God. Because he did that good thing, God accepted him as right with himself.
korean_text: 우리 조상 아브라함이 그 아들 이삭을 제단에 바칠 때에 행함으로 의롭다 하심을 받은 것이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: He offered his son Isaac on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 아들 이삭을 제단에 바쳤습니다

sentences.original_text: Because he did that good thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 좋은 일을 했기 때문에

sentences.original_text: God accepted him as right with himself
